metadata.title: CVE-2018-11728 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_reparse_point_values_read_data function inlibfsntfs_reparse_point_values.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allowsremote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based bufferover-read) via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this asdescribed in libyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
